d:
Backup of his stuff on this three Mastodon platforms: Pawoo for the short time he used it, mostly Baraag unless he forget it and just post on Misskey (more silly stuff or previews, all .webp on MK sadly).

Deleted the old rant, it wasn't important, you guys can catch it in previous versions of this gallery. Pawoo server is still ass, really hope Baraag doesn't shit the bed again and have to check his Misskey account on it like some time in the past, sheesh...

Update: No new cover because of a mix of being lazy + not much of a fan of Ralts...
